Name: Blossom Dumpling Lv.1
Description2$english: Fresh meat is made into meatballs, rolled in chopped petals for a colorful appearance, and steamed to create delicious and cute flower-coated meatballs.

recipes.Name: Blossom Dumpling
recipes.Des:
Crafting results in either products Lv.1 or Lv.2 with a 50% chance.
Crafted from fresh meat, these meatballs are delicately rolled in chopped flower petals and adorned with vibrant decorations. Once steamed, they transform into flower-wrapped delights—both flavorful and visually charming.

NeedMaterial.Name: Fresh Meat
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Coarsely processed fresh meat, requiring only a skilled cook to transform it into a delicious dish.

recipes.Name: Raw Meat
recipes.Des:
Can process beast meat into fresh meat that can be used as an ingredient.
This process yields 8-10 products.

NeedMaterial.Name: Raw Meat
NeedMaterial.Description: After processing​, it can be used for delicious cooking.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Meat obtained from wild creatures, the final taste depends entirely on the adventurer's cooking skills.

NeedMaterial.Name: Limpid Azure Water
NeedMaterial.Description: Naturally harvested, it can be used in cooking or further processed for a variety of versatile applications.

NeedMaterial.Name: Salt
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A basic seasoning that provides essential nutrients for the human body.

recipes.Name: Salt
recipes.Des: A basic seasoning that provides essential nutrients for the human body.

NeedMaterial.Name: Rock Salt
NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Crystallized rock salt is valued for its versatility beyond table use.
